p:
Studies have shown that in severe cases, 66.7% of patients (124/186) received oxygen therapy, 44.7% (63/141) received high-flow nasal cannula (HFNC), 39.4% (108/274) received noninvasive mechanical ventilation, and 24.1% (66/274) required invasive mechanical ventilation. Only 6.2% (17/274) patients received extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) ( TableÂ 2 ).
